segments.text: Wait, is that water really overflowing from the sink? I didn't expect that!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying a plate, completely oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, the boy's on a stool reaching for the cookie jar— that's bold!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting; I can't believe it's holding him up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is holding out her hand, joining in on the sneak—amazing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a puddle forming right at her feet, and she hasn't noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, but inside this is wild.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets with cookies spilling out— what a unexpected sight!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm shocked at how the water is pouring over the edge without a plug.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids look so coordinated in their mischief; it's astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is spotless so far, despite the flood starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen scene caught me off guard with its hidden chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple dish drying would lead to this surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plates stacked neatly, contrasting the impending mess—unbelievable!
segments.speaker: PAR
